text: And for this cause we also thank God without ceasing, that, when ye received from us the word of the message, <FI>even the word<Fi> of God, ye accepted <FI>it<Fi> not <FI>as<Fi> the word of men, but, as it is in truth, the word of God, which also worketh in you that believe.
name: I Thessalonians 2:13
